technology.name: Plight of the No-Horns
technology.description: The thrumming power of a Herdstone invigorates the lowly Ungors’ thirst to take vengeance upon the world that spawned them.

effects.description: Weapon strength: +10% when fighting against Dwarfs, High Elves, Wood Elves, Dark Elves and Men
Leadership: +4 for Ungor Herd and Ungor Spearmen Herd units
Melee attack: +3 for Ungor Herd and Ungor Spearmen Herd units

technology.name: Raining Blood
technology.description: Few Beastmen possess the skill or patience for ranged combat, but still value the bow as a tool of the hunt.

effects.description: Ammunition: +10% for Ungor Raiders units
Melee attack: +4 for Ungor Herd and Ungor Spearmen Herd units
Reload time reduction: +10% for Ungor Raiders units
Only one technology can be researched from this group, second will be locked!

technology.name: The Unnatural Order
technology.description: The Beastmen will not rest until all are trampled beneath their cloven feet, and they alone rule the wilds.

effects.description: Hero self-defence: +10% chance of wounding aggressors
Leadership aura size: +25% during ambushes
Charge bonus: +10% for Gor Herd and Centigors units

technology.name: Savage Mantle
technology.description: With thick hide and great horns, each Beastman is a heavily-muscled brute of preternatural toughness.

effects.description: Armour: +10 for Gor Herd, God Gors and Bestigor Herd units
Bonus vs infantry: +4 for Gor units
Armour: +10 for Gor units
Only one technology can be researched from this group, second will be locked!

technology.name: Empire of Beasts
technology.description: Surrounding each settlement of the Old World is an impenetrable mass of gnarled forest, containing uncounted horrors…

effects.description: Vigour loss reduction: -10% during siege battles
Missile resistance: 10% during siege battles

technology.name: Bestial Resilience
technology.description: Adorned in pillaged armour, beaten to shape with hoof and fist, the warherd makes mock of men.

effects.description: Physical resistance: 10% for Chaos Warhounds, Harpies, Razorgor Herd and Manticore units.
Armour: +10 for Manticore units
Ability: "Regeneration" for Manticore units
Fire resistance: 25% for Manticore units
Only one technology can be researched from this group, second will be locked!

technology.name: Days of Wrath
technology.description: The march of the brayherd gathers momentum, as the Cloven Ones cavort in the flickering flames of burning cities.

effects.description: Armour: +10 for Minotaur units
Horde growth: +4

technology.name: Rampage!
technology.description: Beastmen are creatures of atavistic fury, and it takes little to drive them into a frenzy of unbridled aggression.

effects.description: Weapon strength: +10% for Minotaur, Cygors, Giants and Ghorgons.
Attribute: Rampage for Bestigor units
Weapon strength: +10% for Bestigor units
Attribute: Unbreakable for Bestigor units

Leadership: +10 for Ungor units

Speed: +10% for Bestigor units
Melee defence: +4 for Bestigor units

technology.name: Worldbane
technology.description: Like wolves upon sheep, Beastmen prey upon all civilisation as they have since the beginning.

effects.description:
Weapon strength: +10% when fighting against Dwarfs, High Elves, Wood Elves, Dark Elves and Men
	(own armies factionwide)
Charge bonus: +20% when attacking
Only one technology can be researched from this group, second will be locked!

technology.name: Death from the Shadows
technology.description: The warherd bides its time to strike, as Ungors and Centigors pierce the hearts of the hated foe from afar.

effects.description: Ambush success chance: +10%
Only one technology can be researched from this group, second will be locked!

technology.name: Rolling Death
technology.description: The gangrel herd lopes alongside heavy chariots, eager to join battle as swiftly as possible.

effects.description: Melee defence: +5 for Razorgor Chariots, Razorgor Herd and Tuskgor Chariots units.
Bonus vs Infantry: +8 for Razorgor Chariots, Razorgor Herd and Tuskgor Chariots units
Only one technology can be researched from this group, second will be locked!

technology.name: The Rewards of Ruin
technology.description: Should the monstrous please their Dark Masters they are blessed with a dark fortitude.

effects.description: Missile resistance: 10% for Ghorgon and Giant units.
Physical resistance: 10% for Ghorgon and Giant units
Speed: +10% for Ghorgon and Giant units

technology.name: Born to Lead
technology.description: Beastlords and Wargors have a swaggering confidence, revelling in their superiority over lesser beasts.

effects.description: Character's aura leadership effect: +5
Leadership aura size: +25%
Only one technology can be researched from this group, second will be locked!

technology.name: Vitriolic Temperament
technology.description: Quick to temper and impossible to tame, such fierceness should be fostered if it cannot be controlled.

effects.description: Melee defence: +5 for Centigors units
Melee attack: +5 for Centigors units
Reload and ammunition: +10% for Centigor units
Weapon strength: +10% for Centigor units
Only one technology can be researched from this group, second will be locked!

technology.name: Man-Cleavers
technology.description: The crude weapons of the Beastmen lack any finesse, but are wielded with brutal strength and unquenchable fury.

effects.description: Weapon Strength: +10% for Razorgor Herd units
Armour-piercing weapon damage: +5 for Chaos Warhounds and Harpies units.
Vigour loss reduction: -10% for Warhounds units
Melee defence: +4 for Harpies units
Only one technology can be researched from this group, second will be locked!

technology.name: Roaming Torment
technology.description: Towering over the battlefield hurling rune-etched remnants of Waystones, temples and monoliths, the Cygor's terrifying form blots out the sun.

Reload time reduction: +10% for Cygor units
Weapon strength: +10% for Cygor units

technology.name: On Cloven Hoof & Twisted Claw
technology.description: The herd surges from darkling woods with speed enough to chase down any prey.

effects.description: Reinforcement range: +20%
Speed: +10% for all units
Only one technology can be researched from this group, second will be locked!

technology.name: Smell Their Fear
technology.description: The Beastmen rule the forests; civilised races dare not venture beneath their dark eaves, lest they be devoured.

effects.description: Attribute: Causes Fear when ambushing
Leadership: +4 during ambushes
Only one technology can be researched from this group, second will be locked!

technology.name: Gaze of the Dark Gods
technology.description: All servants of the Ruinous Powers – horned or no – crave the gaze of the Dark Gods.

effects.description: Spell resistance: 25% for Chaos Spawn units
Passive ability: "Regeneration" for Jabberslythe units
Casualty replenishment rate: +10% for Chaos Spawn units
Only one technology can be researched from this group, second will be locked!

technology.name: The Kalkengard Larder
technology.description: Pity the poor defenders of Kalkengard, hung from its trees and ruined, rocky spires as meat for hungry Minotaurs.

effects.description: Charge bonus: +10 for Minotaur units
Attribute: Vanguard Deployment for Minotaur units.
Ability: "Bolstered Attack" for Minotaur units
Only one technology can be researched from this group, second will be locked!

technology.name: Horns of War
technology.description: When the tribes unite under the greatest chieftains, the ground shakes at the brayherd's march.

effects.description: Passive ability: "Guardian" for Lords and embedded Heroes

target_if: Unit is a Lord or Hero

technology.name: The Strong Survive
technology.description: Against the strength of the warherd, the regimented ranks of the civilised are as nothing. Smash their lines and defile their colours!

effects.description: Dread gained from battles: +20%

technology.name: Messenger of the Bray
technology.description: An agent of the Chaos Gods, acting in their stead, will be granted favour… until they fail.

effects.description: Hero action cost: -50%
Enemy Hero action success chance: -10%
Campaign line of sight: +25%

technology.name: Primal Fury
technology.description: Just like their fury, the Cloven Ones' hunt is eternal; it never began, it shall never end. It always was.

effects.description: Passive ability: "Primal Fury Upgraded"
Enable recruitment: Khorngors units in Herdstones settlements
Research rate: -25%
Spell resistance: 25% for Khorngors units
Bonus vs infantry: +10 for Khorngors units
Enable recruitment: Pestigors units in Herdstones settlements
Research rate: -25%
Melee defence: +10 for Pestigors units
Fire resistance: 25% for Pestigors units

technology.name: The Warherd Ravages
technology.description: The Beastmen sweep across their Blood-grounds, consumed by savage fury, tearing apart the hated foe!

effects.description: Campaign movement range: +15%

technology.name: Kadon Unleashed
technology.description: Wielding the transformative power of Chaos, Bray-Shamans debase their foes and lend mutative strength to the herd.

effects.description: Chance of a plague spreading: -25%
Spell number of uses: +1 for "Transformation of Kadon"

ui_effects.description: Spawned unit fights in this battle only
Spawned unit fights in this battle only

effects.description: Spell number of uses: +1 for "Savage Dominion"

technology.name: Dominate the World
technology.description: The Cloven Ones cannot rest until all civilisation lies in ruin, and everything noble is trampled beneath their blood-encrusted hooves.

effects.description: Winds of Magic power reserve change: +20% when increasing
Miscast base chance: -20%

technology.name: Consume Order
technology.description: Though they favour the flesh of men, the Beastmen are indiscriminate in their hatred of all civilised races.
